suggest.amasty/module-hide-price: Install Hide Price extension to hide the original prices of products in quote requests
suggest.amasty/module-request-quote-mftf-2: Install module-request-quote-mftf-2 module to be able to run Request a Quote MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version
suggest.amasty/module-request-quote-mftf-3: Install module-request-quote-mftf-3 module to be able to run Request a Quote MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version
